TopicTitle: [11/26/15 Update] Say Hello to the Light-Green Group!

Articles.Content: Wha..Oops. I may have been doing homework at the same time. Sorry.

Well, the last time the list has been updated was September 10.. I'm sorry to pressure, but any news?

Thanks!

I've got to transfer the program over to my laptop (I've been doing it on my desktop) and I will work really hard tonight to finish all the descriptions. Hold tight!

I've got to transfer the program over to my laptop (I've been doing it on my desktop) and I will work really hard tonight to finish all the descriptions. Hold tight!

Im coming light green group! Soon! I guess my 7 month calculations were wrong... How long has it been since I posted the other comment!

Edit found it!

1st September 2015, 15:51

Edited October 11, 2015 by ghostbuzzer7

Wow! I'm in the Light Green now! Only 6 months since I joined, and 5 since I really started to do things on the forum!

OP, if you need a few things to be pointed toward, check out The Asteroid Sentinels,(The 2nd graphic novel ever on the forums), and some of my crafts, especially Voyager, my greatest claim!

There are 173 ( soon to be 4) members in this group.

I'm thinking it's just gonna grow faster and faster, I might have to resort to another method of keeping the group, maybe splitting it into upper light green and lower light green or something, because this is getting a bit ridiculous.

There are 173 ( soon to be 4) members in this group.

I'm thinking it's just gonna grow faster and faster, I might have to resort to another method of keeping the group, maybe splitting it into upper light green and lower light green or something, because this is getting a bit ridiculous.

Or run the updater often

Good to hear it's still up and running!

Or run the updater often

Good to hear it's still up and running!

Trust me, the updater isn't the problem, takes 30 seconds. Its the descriptions. If I didn't have to descriptions it would take me 5 whole minutes to update the group

But the descriptions are what make being on the group special, so we can't just leave them out.

Trust me, the updater isn't the problem, takes 30 seconds. Its the descriptions. If I didn't have to descriptions it would take me 5 whole minutes to update the group

But the descriptions are what make being on the group special, so we can't just leave them out.

Crowd-source the descriptions We're a group, not a list! We can do group things!

I've been considering writing up a website that always shows the latest group, with the ability to submit descriptions for members who don't have one yet (which are then reviewed before they're accepted), just for fun. For keeping it here on the forum I'd recommend setting up a spreadsheet through Google Docs with three columns: the group member who needs a description, the person who has volunteered to write a description, and the description. If no one has volunteered, people can write their own names down, and when they have a description written they just paste it in. Then all you have to do is copy the name and description into the Descriptions file. Definitely set up the spreadsheet so that anyone can write to it, I think we're all pretty responsible here.

I still might write up that website, it'd be fun

~100 points away.

EDIT: Closer to 90 now. Birthdays are a great opportunity for rep gathering. *wink*

EDIT 2: 80 more and I shall ascend! But my birthday's over; so now I must gather rep by CONTRIBUTING to the community and being CREATIVE. Gosh.

Edited October 22, 2015 by Rainbowtrout

Just got my fifth bar !

Light green group here I come... in 99 rep points... which can take 1 week... or 6 months, depending on... things, I guess...

Woop on three light green bars!

Frozen_Heart. No Description Yet!

That's odd I had a description while on one bar :/

Some of the names need their colors fixed. MasterTao should be a green-named moderator and vexx32 should be a regular user since he stepped down from moderating.

Also: Please remove the "well-deserving of the #1 spot" from my description, please.

Some of the names need their colors fixed. MasterTao should be a green-named moderator and vexx32 should be a regular user since he stepped down from moderating.

Also: Please remove the "well-deserving of the #1 spot" from my description, please.

I'm sorry you feel that it should be removed, but it has been done for the next update. I kept it because it's true, but. Yeah. Also, vexx32 is already fixed in the program documents, MasterTao will be fixed shortly. I have recruited help, and am still working I promise. I severely underestimated the amount of work this is, and have also been very busy with nearly killing myself trying to get into college. I really am sorry it's taken so long, and I will take any flak for it.

Yeah, it was a little bug with the descriptions, you were listed twice, once with and once without the "_" in your name. Fixed now on my end, you'll see it fixed in the update.
No flak, your schoolwork should come first.
